originalText.text: Dr Jose Meller is the best!! His knowledge, his integrity, his patient care his everything. Whatever you need and want in a doctor? That’s who Dr. Meller is. His office manage Sally is wonderfully patient, kind and caring. Did I mention Dr. Meller is also kind and caring.

text.text: Dr Jose Meller is the best!! His knowledge, his integrity, his patient care his everything. Whatever you need and want in a doctor? That’s who Dr. Meller is. His office manage Sally is wonderfully patient, kind and caring. Did I mention Dr. Meller is also kind and caring.

originalText.text: He is the best. He has one receptionist who has been with him for 35 years. She is his gatekeeper and is terrific. He has an office manager and 2 other ladies in the office.

text.text: He is the best. He has one receptionist who has been with him for 35 years. She is his gatekeeper and is terrific. He has an office manager and 2 other ladies in the office.

originalText.text:
DR. Meller is very caring in very calm, he is fully nice to the clients.
The problem is with his receptionist, i was there and they was so angry and negative the whole time,  the both were very nasty.

I think he should consider them...

originalText.text: Dr. Meller saved my mother's life by taking over her case from another mount Sinai cardiologist.  He simply changed her meds and everything started going to the better.  Thank you Dr.

text.text: Dr. Meller saved my mother's life by taking over her case from another mount Sinai cardiologist.  He simply changed her meds and everything started going to the better.  Thank you Dr.

originalText.text: Been using him over 35 years. Knows the case remembers conversations from five years ago and doesn't waste my time with tests etc. Have referred numerous family members to him
